Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750000. We understand that its true worth may be subjective, but we are confident that this offer represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss the details further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this unique product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
